mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectInfGodFitLktb Generator(Generator) 2019-11-15 */ BRND_ID , PRDLST_CD , LANG_CD , FIT_SECT_CD , SESON_GRP_CD , RECOMEND_SEX_CD , POM_CD , FIT_LKTB_CNNC_NO , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM INF_GOD_FIT_LKTB WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteInfGodFitLktb Generator(Generator) 2019-11-15 */ FROM INF_GOD_FIT_LKTB WHERE 1 = 1
